text: (Hoi Thien Su Muhammad, Nguoi hay nho lai) khi Ibrahim khan cau (Allah): “Lay Thuong Đe cua be toi, xin Ngai cho be toi thay cach ma Ngai lam song lai cai chet!” (Allah) phan bao (Ibrahim): “Phai chang Nguoi khong tin?” (Ibrahim) thua: “Bam khong phai nhu vay, be toi chi muon cung co tam long cua minh ma thoi.” (Allah) phan bao (Ibrahim): “Vay thi Nguoi hay bat bon con chim va bam chung ra thanh tung manh roi tron lai voi nhau, sau đo Nguoi hay đe moi phan thit cua chung tren moi ngon nui. Xong, Nguoi hay goi chung, chung se (tro lai thanh nhung con chim nhu ban đau) bay nhanh đen Nguoi. Va Nguoi hay biet rang Allah la Đang Toan Nang, Sang Suot.”
